q1: How many players are on your team?
a1: Unless someone is unfortunately sent off, eleven!
q2: I wonder if the number of players allowed on the pitch was 11 from the day that soccer originated.
a2: There are fields that only allow 5 players in the pitch. Usually the fields are smaller
q3: Does indoor soccer have a different player count?
q5: I've always known and played with 11 players on the team
a5: I would love to play Iniesta
